column1: #Text=Zuko says : " For so long , all I wanted was for you to love me , to accept me .
#Text=" Ozai says : " Then you have learned nothing !
#Text=" Zuko says : " No , I 've learned everything !
#Text=And I 've had to learn it on my own !
#Text=Growing up , we were taught that the Fire Nation was the greatest civilization in history .
#Text=And somehow , the War was our way of sharing our greatness with the rest of the world .
#Text=The people of the world are terrified by the Fire Nation .
#Text=We 've created an era of fear in the world .
#Text=And if we do n't want the world to destroy itself , we need to replace it with an era of peace and kindness .
#Text=" Ozai says : " Your uncle has gotten to you , has n't he ?
